main event: A UFO sighting was reported on August 2, 1954, in Westlake, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical in shape and white in color., It was observed dropping from 5000 ft to 2000 ft in 3 seconds., The object remained at 2000 ft for 10 seconds before disappearing., One observer reported it using binoculars for approximately three minutes., The observer had a background in astronomy and aircraft identification.
witness description: a member of the Cleveland Astronomical Society with experience in aircraft identification
